lead_paragraph: “The Increasingly Poor Decisions of Todd Margaret” tracks the misadventures of David Cross as a clueless temp worker sent to Britain as a sales manager.
snippet: “The Increasingly Poor Decisions of Todd Margaret” tracks the misadventures of David Cross as a clueless temp worker sent to Britain as a sales manager.
